branchCategory.name: ITVX2000, High Pressure Electro-Pneumatic Regulator
branchCategory.description: <P>Series ITVX2000 high pressure electro-pneumatic regulator provides stepless control of air pressure to an electrical signal. They have an easy to read digital pressure display and a power consumption of 3 W or less. The new series has a 5.0 MPa maximum supply pressure.</P>
